EmailTemplate.name: 202103_DSS_Application_Email.Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: All mobile applications have been updated/released and are now available for download!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
UPDATE April 12th, 2021: All mobile applications have been updated/released and are now available for download!
Dear Honeywell Customers,
We’re committed to helping our customers/partners maintain the security of our products and their aircraft and frequently provide software updates for existing, fielded products to keep pace with current technological advances. We have updated a number of mobile applications that were taken offline Tuesday, March 30th.
The following versions of the mobile applications have been taken offline.
Mobile Application
Discontinued Version
IDM
iOS v4.0.6 – v4.0.5
IDM
Windows v4.0.7 – v4.0.0
Data Manager
Windows v4.7.0 or earlier
OneNav+
Windows v2.9.0 or earlier
MxAdvisor
iOS v1.1.0 or earlier
If you are using any of the applications referenced above, you will be required to update to a version listed in the table below.
Mobile Application
Versions Supported
Release Date
Location of Software
IDM
iOS v1.7
Current
Apple Store
IDM / JDM
Windows v3.4.5.4
Current
https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login <[[https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login]]>
IDM
iOS v4.0.8
Available
Apple Store
IDM
Windows v4.0.8
Available
https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login <[[https://inds.epicinds.com/epic/login]]>
Data Manager
Windows v5.0.0
Available
https://ads.honeywell.com <[[https://ads.honeywell.com]]>
OneNav+
Windows v2.10.0
Available
https://ads.honeywell.com <[[https://ads.honeywell.com]]>
MxAdvisor
iOS v1.2.0
Available
Apple Store
While this should be a straightforward update, it may cause temporary disruptions for some customers. We’re committed to limiting and mitigating any issues and are available to assist as needed.
FAQs are available under the News section at the following link: ads.honeywell.com/login <[[https://ads.honeywell.com/login]]>.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Team
fsstechsupport@honeywell.com <[[mailto:fsstechsupport@honeywell.com]]> 1-800-601-3099 602-365-3099 Option 2 then option 1
